d:
Outfall is an adult parody comic based on the Fallout game series. Its about Survivors awaken from cryo sleep, only to find themselves trapped in a vault with strangers.

This project kicked off on November 29, 2024.

Any criticism is welcome; I need it to improve my work. You can reach me on Patreon, SubscribeStar, or Pixiv.

Please support me on Patreon or Subscribestar or Itch.io

https://patreon.com/Arexacomix
https://subscribestar.adult/arexacomix
https://arexacomix.itch.io/outfall

(Readers on Patreon or SubscribeStar get early access 60 to 67 pages ahead (About 2 Episode and half), plus full resolution art, bonus cut content, and exclusive scenes you wonâ€™t find in the public version.)
